revision.text: [[Image:Zahir_hussain.jpg|thumb|Dr. M.Z. Hussain]] '''Dr. Mohamed Zahir Hussain''' ([[Dhivehi]]:ޑރ. މުޙައްމަދު ޒާހިރު ޙުސައިން) was the former Minister of sports of the [[Maldives]]. He is also the owner of [[Haveeru Daily]] newspaper, published daily in the [[Maldives]].

[[Image:Zahir_hussain.jpg|thumb|Dr. M.Z. Hussain]] '''Mohamed Zahir Hussain''' ([[Dhivehi]]. މުޙައްމަދު ޒާހިރު ޙުސައިން) was the former Minister of sports of the [[Maldives]]. He is also the owner of [[Haveeru Daily]] newspaper, published daily in the [[Maldives]].

[[Image:Zahir_hussain.jpg|thumb|Dr. M.Z. Hussain]] '''Dr. Mohamed Zahir Hussain''' ([[Dhivehi]]:ޑރ. މުޙައްމަދު ޒާހިރު ޙުސައިން) was the former Minister of sports of the [[Maldives]]. He is also the owner of [[Haveeru Daily]] newspaper, published daily in the [[Maldives]].

[[Image:Zahir_hussain.jpg|thumb|Dr. M.Z. Hussain]] '''Dr. Mohamed Zahir Hussain''' ([[Dhivehi]]:ޑރ. މުޙައްމަދު ޒާހިރު ޙުސައިން) was the former Minister of sports of the [[Maldives]]. He is also the owner of [[Haveeru Daily]] newspaper, published daily in the [[Maldives]].
[[Category:Maldivian politicians]]

[[Image:Zahir_hussain.jpg|thumb|Dr. M.Z. Hussain]] '''Dr. Mohamed Zahir Hussain''' ([[Dhivehi]]:ޑރ. މުޙައްމަދު ޒާހިރު ޙުސައިން) was the former Minister of sports of the [[Maldives]]. He is also the owner of [[Haveeru Daily]] newspaper, published daily in the [[Maldives]].
